alert.note: Alert for Antelope (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 12:36PM CDT until May 30 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ANTELOPE COUNTY... At 1235 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles east of Orchard, or 17 miles northwest of Neligh, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Antelope County, including the following locations... Ashfall Fossil Beds State Historical Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for northeastern Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
